va_textiles.label: V&A Case Route: Textiles & Dress Collection Pathway
va_textiles.goal: Route to object-based research and collection contexts for 19th–20th century dress.
steps: Start from V&A landing pages for collections and research.
Use collection search and object records to locate garments by period/material/technique.
Follow research essays/exhibition pages when available; cross-check with university library catalogues.

met_costume_institute.label: Met Case Route: Costume Institute Pathway
met_costume_institute.goal: Route to institutional collection area and research framing for historical fashion topics.
steps: Open the Costume Institute collection area page.
Use The Met Collection search to locate objects by era/designer/material.
Prefer museum essays/exhibitions catalogues; cross-route to university syllabi and library holdings.

lcf_design_history.label: LCF Case Route: Fashion History & Theory (Academic Pathway)
lcf_design_history.goal: Route to academic programs and library-based research pathways for 19th–20th century fashion theory.
steps: Use institutional library catalogues and reading lists where publicly available.
Cross-check museum catalogues (V&A/Met) for object-based primary sources.
